Name: Maddox
Fate: Sunk by German air attack, 10 July 1943
Armament:
4 × 5 in (127 mm)/38 caliber DP guns
6 × 0.50 in (12.7 mm) machine guns
2 × twin 40 mm (1.6 in) AA guns
5 × 20 mm (0.79 in) AA guns,
5 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes (5 Mark 15 torpedoes)
6 × depth charge projectors,
2 × depth charge tracks
